Intro from Rebecca: Yes, this post pretty much just pimps our PRO tools, but it's been a busy week and sometimes it's nice to have a little praise, damnit. I am a new SEOmoz PRO member, and I have just been absolutely LOVING all the great tools! I especially like the Term Targeting tool, and I've used it on my personal site with striking success. I had no idea how un-targeted certain pages were! And for other pages that I thought were targeting certain keywords, I come to find out they really weren't. After revising a few pages according to the Term Targeting tool, I then re-checked those pages using SEOmoz's other great tool: the Rank Checker. I checked the SERPS for those new pages and terms, and I was really impressed with the outcome: modest, but substantial increases in ranking. As an SEO specialist and CEO of a multimedia communications company, I had been utilizing the SEOmoz free tools with my SEO clients, but that was limited, and I need to do more. So, I finally "broke down" and bought the subscription. I don't regret it one bit. These tools really work! Copied! Back to Top
